程序包 io.github.moyusowo.neoartisanapi.api.block.gui

类 ArtisanBlockGUI

java.lang.Object
io.github.moyusowo.neoartisanapi.api.block.gui.ArtisanBlockGUI
所有已实现的接口:
Listener, BlockInventoryHolder, InventoryHolder
public abstract class ArtisanBlockGUI extends Object implements BlockInventoryHolder, Listener
Abstract base class for custom block GUIs, implementing an interface bound to a block location.

Core features:

  • Automatic event management - Automatically registers required event listeners
  • Lifecycle control - Provides initialization (init) and termination (terminate) hooks
  • Delayed initialization - Ensures block data is loaded before initialization
  • Task scheduling - Binds to block task scheduler
  • Location binding - Strictly associated with a specific block location
Inheritance requirements:
  1. Must implement init() method for initialization
  2. Can override terminate() to implement cleanup logic
  3. Do not call getArtisanBlockData() directly in constructor
另请参阅:
  • BlockInventoryHolder
  • Listener

    • ArtisanBlockGUI

      protected ArtisanBlockGUI(Plugin plugin, int size, net.kyori.adventure.text.Component title, Location location)
      Basic constructor (should not be called outside GUICreator.create(Location))
      参数:
      plugin - plugin instance (non-null)
      size - inventory size (multiple of 9)
      title - title
      location - framework-provided block location (non-null)

      title - title
      location - framework-provided block location

      size - inventory size
      title - traditional string title (automatically converted to MiniMessage)
      location - framework-provided block location

      title - traditional string title (automatically converted to MiniMessage)
      location - bound block location

  • 方法详细资料

    • getInventory

      @NotNull public @NotNull Inventory getInventory()
      Gets the bound inventory instance
      指定者:
      getInventory 在接口中 InventoryHolder
      返回:
      the inventory associated with this GUI

    • getBlock

      @NotNull public @NotNull Block getBlock()
      Gets the bound block instance
      指定者:
      getBlock 在接口中 BlockInventoryHolder
      返回:
      the physical block associated with the inventory

    • getArtisanBlockData

      @NotNull public @NotNull ArtisanBlockData getArtisanBlockData()
      Gets the associated custom block data

      Safe access times:

      • init() method and its call chain
      • Event handling methods (like onClick(InventoryClickEvent))
      • Lifecycle task execution
      返回:
      the custom block data at this location (never null)
      抛出:
      NullPointerException - if block data is not yet loaded

    • addLifecycleTask

      protected void addLifecycleTask(@NotNull @NotNull Runnable runnable, long delay, long period, boolean isAsynchronous, boolean runInChunkNotLoaded)
      Add GUI lifecycle task

      Used to register periodic tasks that need to run after GUI initialization. Must be called before init() method executes.

      另请参阅:
      • ArtisanBlockData.getLifecycleTaskManager()

    • onInit

      public final void onInit()
      Execute GUI initialization process (called internally by framework)

      This method is automatically triggered after confirming the associated block data is loaded. Execution order:

      1. Call subclass implementation of init() method
      2. Start all registered lifecycle tasks
      3. Mark initialization as complete

      Important:This method is automatically called by the framework, developers should not trigger it manually.

      另请参阅:
      • abstract initialization method

    • init

      protected abstract void init()
      Abstract initialization method (subclass must implement)

      Called automatically by the framework after confirming associated block data is loaded. In this method you can safely:

      • Access getArtisanBlockData() to get block data
      • Initialize inventory item layout
      • Configure initial GUI state
      • Register lifecycle events
      抛出:
      IllegalStateException - if block data is unavailable

    • terminate

      protected void terminate()
      Termination cleanup method (subclass can optionally implement)

      Called when the GUI-associated block is destroyed, for executing resource cleanup operations.

    • onClick

      public void onClick(InventoryClickEvent event)
      Inventory click event handler (cancels all operations by default)

    • onDrag

      public void onDrag(InventoryDragEvent event)
      Inventory drag event handler (cancels all operations by default)

    • onInteract

      public final void onInteract(PlayerInteractEvent event)
      Handle block GUI opening
